function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and unreliable results","Mitigation":"Use of comprehensive data sources and transparent data collection methods","Technologies":"Data validation and quality assessment tools","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and data collectors","Owner":"Researchers and data collectors"},{"Description":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","Impact":"Inconsistencies in quality assessment and potential for bias","Mitigation":"Use of structured and standardized quality assessment protocols","Technologies":"Quality assessment software and tools","People":"Reviewers and quality assessors","Owner":"Quality assurance team or committee"},{"Description":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","Impact":"Potential for biased estimates and unreliable pooled effects","Mitigation":"Consideration of study design, setting, and intervention when selecting meta-analysis method","Technologies":"Meta-analysis software with robust selection criteria","People":"Researchers and statisticians","Owner":"Research team or statistical analysis group"}]}
